div.p: We are a public charter school serving 9th – 12th grade students that provides an alternative to traditional public school districts.

Due to Governor Abbott’s executive order, students will not be returning to the campus for the remainder of the year and will continue with online/remote learning. The 2020 Graduation Ceremony will be rescheduled for the seniors who pass for the year. Stay tuned for up-to-date information.

The Texas Education Agency is requiring districts to provide instructional support to students during school closings. Students Who Have Modules Courses To Complete In Odysseyware May Work On Those Lessons At Any Time Using Their Internet They May Have At Home. All other courses will be done using Google Classroom, and students will be receiving grades on google class assignments (or paper packet assignments for those without internet access).

Again, we will continue to monitor this situation and will be in contact with you throughout this closure. Please regularly check your email, our school website, Remind, and Facebook accounts for any updates we are able to send out. As we get updated information from TEA we will communicate with staff, students, and families as soon as possible.
Dr. Kendra Nelson- Principal Crosstimbers Academy

Crosstimbers Academy employs innovative and comprehensive learning techniques to provide students with an individualized, focus-based education. Serving grades 9-12, Crosstimbers Academy offers flexibility and convenience with multiple schedules per day. Scholars are encouraged to participate in morning or afternoon coursework affording them the ability to garner life skills outside of the traditional educational environment. Our motivated and experienced educators employ the latest project-based learning techniques and educational systems to motivate and nurture each scholar to achieve their highest potential.

li.a: Crosstimbers Academy Receives 2019 Best of Weatherford Award
Public Notification of Nondiscrimination in Career and Technology Education Programs (Vocational Programs)

div.p: Crosstimbers Academy provides students with all the tools necessary to succeed in school and beyond. Check out our Scholar Resources section to find information about our school calendar and class schedule. Parents can now access the Ascender Parent Portal to check on their student’s progress.
Join our Pack now! Become one of the newest members of our family and enjoy the excitement and journey your fellow Timberwolves!

Mailing Address:
PO Box 1327
Weatherford, TX 76086
